newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: INP unit lifts W&H stake to 13.89 pct.
newsitem.headline: INP unit lifts W&H stake to 13.89 pct.

text.p: Independent Press Communications Ltd, a subsidiary of Independent Newspapers Plc, on Monday said it had raised its stake in New Zealand publisher Wilson and Horton to 13.89 percent from 12.16 percent.
IPCL is bidding for all of Wilson and Horton, offering NZ$11 or 1.375 exchangeable INP shares for each W&H share.
Independent Newspapers and family trusts linked to principal Tony O'Reilly held 45.15 percent of Wilson and Horton prior to the bid. --Wellington Newsroom (64 4) 4734746
